articles.description: Like every year this year too, Shilpa Shetty brought home a Ganpati idol with husband Raj Kundra.
articles.content:
Shilpa Shetty continued her tradition and brought a Ganpati idol home to celebrate Ganesh Chaturthi. The actress was spotted at an idol workshop in Mumbai on Sunday, September 17.
